resources.string: Step 1 - Whenever you want to prove your identity ask the security person to generate a unique QR from "app" api(You have to provide him phone no.)
Step 2 - When Security person enters your phone no. a unique secured QR will be generated
Step 3 - You have to scan that QR and a pop up will ask your phone number to confirm that you requested for identity and then a OTP will be sent to your number.
Step 4 - After successful verification, our app will send you the verified identity to you as well the security person.
